Table of Contents

Interface IDdeTransactionFilter

Namespace
NDde.Advanced
Assembly
NDde.dll

This defines a transaction filter.

public interface IDdeTransactionFilter

Remarks

Use a transaction filter to intercept the DDEML callback function. The PreFilterTransaction method will be called every time the DDEML callback function executes. The Transaction object passed into the method contains the parameters of the DDE callback function. By using a transaction filter the developer has compelete control over the DDEML. See the MSDN documentation for more information on using the DDEML.

caution

Incorrect usage of the DDEML can cause this library to function incorrectly and can lead to resource leaks.

Methods

PreFilterTransaction(DdeTransaction)

This filters a transaction before it is dispatched.

bool PreFilterTransaction(DdeTransaction t)

Parameters

t DdeTransaction

The transaction to be dispatched.

Returns

bool

True to filter the transaction and stop it from being dispatched, false otherwise.

Remarks

This method is called everytime the DDEML callback function executes.

caution

Incorrect usage of the DDEML can cause this library to function incorrectly and can lead to resource leaks.
